text: I need to find my missing piece.

♪ That'd be more than
enough for me ♪
What's up, everybody?

Welcome to Seabrook's super
awesome Fall Ball.

Wait, you probably don't
recognize me.

Now you can see
this handsome face.
You're welcome-- Ah!

I mean, uh, what's up,
skelly man?

You're just in time to see
the best part of this dance.
Happy Fall Ball!

Ugh, I am so close to crushing
this Halloween dance.

Um, from here it looks
totally crushed.
What else could you possible do?

I don't want people to just say,
oh, what a great dance.

I want them to be like, wow,
can you believe that dance?
( grunting )

Tell me again how you got out of
pushing the heavy cart, Willa?

I'm navigating. I'm like your
own personal howling GPS,

by the way, you have
reached your destination.
( howls )

Whoa, Willa. You are good
at this navigating thing.
Yes, yes, yes!

More spooky decorations,
extra costumes,

I think this just might work.
Thanks for your help, everyone.

We zombies have
the intellectual capabilities
to help out with any plan.

Wow! Thought you were going
to go for the brains joke.
Got to keep you on your toes.

And there's a full moon
and some bones laying around

it's like a happy place
for us werewolves.

I know it's a lot but
it's going to be worth it.
We were made for this.
♪ We were made for this ♪
♪ Didn't come here to lose ♪

♪ We came to play,
we're here to stay ♪

♪ What's left to say
when we know ♪

♪ Nothing's gonna get

let me hear you say ♪

♪ We're fired up,
you're fired up ♪

- ( cheering )

I am so excited
to create something
people will talk about forever.

I'm not scared, by the way,
if you were thinking.

Just checking out
the vibe over here.

- Totally.

It's just the Shrimpy costume.

I did this so he'd be super
scary, but is it scary enough?
Uh, I'm going to go with, yes!

Ah, I just feel like
I can do more.

Really make something that
no one's going to forget.

I've got these
stones in my pocket.
We can decorate him with these.

Yes! Spooky stones.
We're doing it.

All right, cheer Frankenstein,
you finish your great creation.

We got the rest of this.
See you at the dance.

You are going to save
a dance for me, right?

- Yes!
This time I get to navigate.
I'm co-navigating.
Whoa! Pretty.

I've never seen the stones
do that before. Cool!

This is going to be
an unforgettable night.
Whoo-hoo! Go, us!

I wonder what else

( Addison laughs )

Aw, you can look while
